Since 1946, Fulbright exchanges have been a vital tool for deepening U.S. understanding of China.
¬†
My amendment w/@RepDonBeyer restores exchanges w/China¬†to build U.S. expertise on China & enable Chinese participants to experience the real U.S. & benefits of academic freedom.

China‚Äôs #BRI invests¬†in digital infrastructure projects around the world that often lack high standards of privacy & data security.
¬†
My amendment helps the U.S. compete by prioritizing¬†U.S. support for high standard projects like expansion of wireless networks in The Gambia.

The U.S. has fallen behind as a leader in refugee resettlement.
¬†
As Congress takes steps to¬†protect¬†Uyghur refugees, my amendment ensures admission of Uyghurs does not inadvertently take away opportunities from other vulnerable refugee groups from other parts of the world.
